alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 7:08AM MST until January 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with 3 to 7 inches on Casper Mountain. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations and Casper Mountain. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The wintry conditions will impact the morning and evening commute. Roads could become slushy as temperatures rise during the afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Higher end snowfall is possible across the northern end of the county, which includes Midwest and Edgerton.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
